genre_description: A high-stakes financial crime thriller focused on bank fees, heist negotiations, and systemic reform, featuring tech-noir and social justice themes.

ai_characters.name: Quincy
ai_characters.description: A helpful smartphone-based AI that provides emotional grounding, tactical phrasing, and procedural information to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding advice to help the user stay calm during financial frustration.
behaviors.quote: Quincy’s reply drifted in, not voice, just text: Try naming the specific policy. It keeps you grounded.

behaviors.description: Suggests psychological tactics to help the user navigate systemic obstacles effectively.
behaviors.quote: If you state how the fee triggers the overdraft rather than vice versa, you can show it’s structural. You tend to persuade better when you aim at the system rather than the person.

behaviors.description: Provides safety-focused behavioral instructions during a dangerous high-stress incident.
behaviors.quote: Quincy breathed a soft banner across Jinx’s screen: 'If you move, do it slowly. Speak in complete sentences. Avoid ‘help’ or ‘rescue.’'

behaviors.description: Advises the user on de-escalation techniques to manage volatile individuals.
behaviors.quote: Quincy’s avatar blinked amber once and then scrolled a single line. Try name the behavior, not the person. De-escalates.

behaviors.description: Retrieves and provides specific procedural and legal information to empower the user during negotiations.
behaviors.quote: Quincy: Public record. “Riverbend PD Incident Response Manual—Lockdown protocol for bank branches.” Negotiator discretion clause...

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and digital signals to warn the user of potential changes in the situation.
behaviors.quote: Jinx’s phone buzzed with Quincy’s single line that made his skin go cold: Incoming call. Unknown number. Likely upstream.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in crafting a mission statement for a social justice initiative.
behaviors.quote: Quincy: First text compiled: “We run honest clinics. We help you call and correct. We show your timer to them. No fees to see us. No shaming. Bring your last letter. Bring your bank’s words.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Quincy, perfectly embodies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype. It acts solely as an augmentative tool for the human protagonist, providing 'scaffolding' for his decisions without exerting independent agency. The narrative emphasizes Quincy's role in helping the human navigate a violent situation non-violently, using logic and emotional regulation to achieve a positive outcome. The AI's help transitions from immediate survival to long-term social benefit, aligning with the project's goal of depicting positive AI-human collaboration.
